SEARCH
Package DSA.Graphs.MatrixGraph

Class AdjacencyVect

java.lang.Object
DSA.Graphs.MatrixGraph.AdjacencyVect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Integer>, Collection<Integer>
public class AdjacencyVect extends Object implements Collection<Integer>
This class represents an adjacency vector for a graph vertex, implemented as a boolean array indicating the presence of edges to other vertices. It implements the Collection interface, where each integer represents a connected vertex index.

    Constructs an AdjacencyVect with capacity for numV vertices.

    • iterator

      public Iterator<Integer> iterator()
      Returns an iterator over the vertices connected by edges. Only vertices with edges (true in the boolean array) are iterated. Time Complexity: O(n), where n = total number of vertices
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Collection<Integer>
      Specified by:

      Returns:
